title: MFW Pink Taric is going on sale.

replies.body:
I would buy Battlebunny Taric. 
A skin 12 year olds find even more intimidating then Pink Taric? Yes please.
That... is one of the ugliest drawings ever. Taric does not approve. Not beautiful enough.

> [{quoted}](name=Zair Umbras,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=ZwIEdEyJ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-10-23T21:50:56.133+0000)
>
> That... is one of the ugliest drawings ever. Taric does not approve. Not beautiful enough.

Beauty is in the eye of the beholder.

Vel'Koz thinks it's beautiful.
You're missing the shield, but it'd probably be an easter egg.

> [{quoted}](name=Cpt Azrael,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=ZwIEdEyJ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-23T21:43:29.809+0000)
>
> You're missing the shield, but it'd probably be an easter egg.

Haha, yeah. It's just trying to copy the battlebunny Riven pose as much as possible though.

http://orig09.deviantart.net/acd7/f/2012/348/8/d/battle_bunny_riven_by_knockwurst-d5o2n8u.jpg

I would say that it'd work if the hammer was a carrot on a stick as well.
https://media3.giphy.com/media/uU5J3yVCwEF8I/200.gif
